attributes.additional_details: The government need to know that there is a disproportionate amount of ex-military personnel living on the street (1 in 10 to be precise) and we think that the government should address this national problem immediatly. It is not right for ex-military personnel who have been prepared to lay down their lives for our Queen and Country and we think that the government should be aware of this. Therefore they should be helping them reclaim there lives to a stable well being.
